content_notes.front_matter: Metadata fields for SEO and sharing live in index.html front matter.
content_notes.body: Primary hero, service highlights, testimonials, FAQs, and CTAs authored directly in index.html markup.

content_notes.front_matter: Service page SEO metadata defined in services.html front matter.
content_notes.body: Service package descriptions, imagery, FAQs, and location copy live in the HTML body of services.html.
content_notes.data: Selected testimonial cards pull individual entries from _data/reviews.json via Liquid assignments.

content_notes.front_matter: Pricing page SEO metadata defined in pricing.html front matter.
content_notes.body: Package pricing tables, upgrade descriptions, and FAQ content authored directly in pricing.html.

content_notes.front_matter: Location page metadata lives in locations.html front matter.
content_notes.body: Service area descriptions, city-by-city highlights, and booking CTA copy authored in locations.html sections.

content_notes.front_matter: About page SEO metadata defined in about.html front matter.
content_notes.body: Team story, values, process highlights, and FAQs authored directly in about.html sections.

content_notes.front_matter: Contact page metadata lives in contact.html front matter.
content_notes.body: Contact form, booking instructions, and contact details authored directly in contact.html markup.
